description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTMeningococcalMonovalentMenCConjugateVaccine for IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine schedule
